You must understand this clip was made by a christian copt living in the US, if you study the persecutions and massacres of copts in Egypt in recent times, you'll see why he hates muslims.

But that being said, and although the movie exaggerates and makes a clown of Muhammad, it basically conveys the historical truth about that man, his murders and child abuse, although muslims shamelessly try to excuse it saying that girls matured early there, etc., but eyeing a six year old and marrying a nine year old is only what a pervert in all ages would do...

Actually the whole movie (over an hour in length) was shown in California at 1 independent local theater to a crowd of less than 10 people. No one seemed to like it very much. It has gone underground ever since. The 14 minute trailer appeared on You Tube in June but received very little interest until it was translated into a Middle Eastern language 2 months later and then it went viral with attacks against the creator. After seeing the trailer, I personally have little to no interest in seeing the whole movie. Bad script, bad acting, not very funny. I am not a muslim nor am I offended at people making fun of other religions, it's just a bad movie based on the trailer. I posted this for freedom of information purposes only.

You have a point, but somehow we must teach these murderous muslim barbarians to accept freedom of some to mock their, beliefs, something that happens all the time in the west and nobody makes a fuss...
